DOC.brief_summary: The objective study obtain normative accelerometry data six minute walk test 30 second walk test healthy subject order determine accelerometric variable relevant describe gait disorder patient population . Secondary objective study investigate impact walk speed muscle strength accelerometric parameter , assess reproducibility method compare accelerometric data obtain two different device .
DOC.brief_title: Assessment Accelerometric Measurement Devices Gait Analysis
